import { useState } from "react" export const Recruite=()=>{ const[pro,setPro]=useState({ "person":"", "experience":0, "role":"", "ctc":0.0, "expected":0.0 }) const track=(eve)=>{ const{name,value}=eve.target setPro((old)=>{ return{ ...old, [name]:value } }) } return(<>

Recruite New Resource

Architect Trade Finance
) }
